name: Project: Bits
description:
Project: Bits is a music and rhythm game that is a derivative of SM-5. The core gameplay involves the player responding to the arrows that appear on the screen with the beat. The goal is to match the scrolling arrows with the stationary arrows.Main Features:
  • Explore over 50+ songs in an ever increasing library from various artists including ones from our very own community.

  • Tackle various levels of difficulty an conquer each song and step.

  • Challenge a friend to a duel and prove to them that you are the ultimate rhythm game master.
